title: WHERE IS MY URF?!
body: riot this must be a sick joke! WHERE IS URF MODE!

replies.body: When is rotating que supposed to come out then?

i am sorry to say but they did say that URF wasn't coming back this april cause they are making rotation queue and we are meant to be happy with that...... and the bobble head draven shit that has caused me to stop playing league until its f-ing gone
Same, I'm not playing league till urf is released, because this is just unfair...
i can deal with not having URF but the f-ing bobble heads need to go. whoever in riot thought of it needs to be fired....
this is ridiculous. I literally started playing again just because URF was coming. Or at least I thought it was.
we need to get the word out about this and hopefully riot will see it!
